message:
SA Guys,

I would like to know which company would you suggest to get hosting and domain name. It's for a blog not something big.

data.message:
If it's gonna be a static site (just plain HTML, CSS, JS files) then I would recommend GitHub Pages (Free) and get a domain name from GoDaddy for example or whatever

If your blog will not be a static one (CMS) then it really depends on your experience with setting up things on servers or on how much you want to be involved

I would recommend having a VPS from DigitalOcean for 5 USD or an even cheaper good option Time4VPS.eu (1 EUR)

Or if it's gonna be a Wordpress one then you could go with Wordpress hosting or any cheap shared hosting company like FatCow for example

You may use Medium  it very good and free
you may also buy a domain name from GoDaddy

Separate the domain company from the hosting
so godaddy for the domain and ..... for the hosting
If it's a blog, you can go with something like WordPRess on http://bit.ly/-BlueHost
If for whatever reason you want a Windows VPS, or premium VPS, http://bit.ly/SoftSys have 20% discount at the moment with code BF2016
If you want a cloud-style VPS (easy to scale up and down), the one answer is usually http://bit.ly/-DigitalOcean
